actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Rules.

official_title: A resolution to amend Rule XLVII of the Rules of the House of Representatives to prohibit a Member from accepting any honorarium (including paid or reimbursed expenses) in an amount greater than $500.

summary.text: Amends rule XLVII of the Rules of the House of Representatives to prohibit a Member of Congress from accepting any honorarium (including paid or reimbursed travel expenses) of more than $500 in value.

titles.title: A resolution to amend Rule XLVII of the Rules of the House of Representatives to prohibit a Member from accepting any honorarium (including paid or reimbursed expenses) in an amount greater than $500.
